adDetails: Do you have a pressing deadline and need help finding a needle in the cloud? FarSun Communications may be a cost effective solution. Remote Research I am a highly experienced online researcher with proficiencies in search using the multiple resources and expansive features of Google Search, Google Scholar and the Proquest Research Library. I have completed Google Courses "Power Searching" and "Advanced Power Searching" and have certificates of completion from Google Analytics Academy for Making Sense of Data Digital Analytics Fundamentals Google Analytics Platform Principles Data Aggregation and Visualization--After the information is gathered, I can help you visualize it with: New Google Sheets and New Google Fusion Tables for analysis and visualization. Original Charts for print Interactive Charts for websites and slide shows Custom Google Maps I am also an experienced writer and editor and can help you refine your reports. Research Background I have a Ph.D. in the environmental sciences from UCSD and have served as a Research Associate in Computer Engineering at UCSC. I have a strong background in academic research and am currently performing research and writing about a wide range of topics including: advancement in the biological sciences, human longevity, the Singularity, Artificial Intelligence, superstrings and multiple dimensions, space habitation, asteroid threats and human evolution. If you would like to talk about your project, please send me an e-mail with your number and and the best time(s) to reach you. Ron S. Nolan, Ph.D. FarSun Communications www.farsun.com show contact info
